messages.message: Hi @Kerry @lenny looking forward to some guidance on this. Can you please help to understand what our stand is here? Any details is highly appreciated!

hey sorry that I missed it — picking the whole feature back is difficult because it includes all frontend and backend changes :confused: it looks like we want to use the cron scheduler to improve SLA, @Varun Rao can you schedule a meeting with @lenny and me to discuss any alternatives than using the cron scheduler? in short, i’d like to avoid picking this back to 22.01 unless it is absolutely necessary
Hi Kerry, understood. I have sent out an invite to review this further with Lenny and you tomorrow
